flounder.sounds

Class AmbientNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • flounder.sounds.AmbientNode

  • public class AmbientNode
extends java.lang.Object
    Basically a 3D sphere of sound that can be added to the world to provide ambient sound effects to a certain area. The node has 2 radius's; within the inner radius the ambient sound is played at full volume. Between the inner and outer radius's the volume decreases the further away from the node you get.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AmbientNode(Vector3f position, float innerRange, float fadeOutRange, java.util.List<Sound> sounds)
      Creates a new ambient node at a given position in the world.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AmbientNode

        public AmbientNode(Vector3f position,
                   float innerRange,
                   float fadeOutRange,
                   java.util.List<Sound> sounds)
        Creates a new ambient node at a given position in the world.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the centre of the node.
        innerRange - The inner radius, within which the ambient sound is played at full volume.
        fadeOutRange - The distance between the inner and outer radius's of the node.
        sounds - The various sounds that the node can play.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float delta)
        Updates the node and plays or stops playing ambient sounds depending on whether the IAudioListener is in range or not.
        Parameters:
        delta - The time in seconds since the last frame.

      • getRange

        public float getRange()
        Returns:
        The distance from the centre of the node to the outer radius.

      • setRanges

        public void setRanges(float innerRange,
                      float fadeOutRange)
        Set the inner and outer radiuses of the node.
        Parameters:
        innerRange - The distance from the centre of the node to the inner radius. Within this radius the ambient sounds are played at full volume.
        fadeOutRange - The distance between the inner and outer radius's.

      • setSounds

        public void setSounds(java.util.List<Sound> sounds)
        Sets the available sounds that this ambient node can play. Fades out any current sounds that are playing before playing any of the new sounds.
        Parameters:
        sounds - The list of sounds.

      • setSound

        public void setSound(Sound sound)
        Sets a single sound for the ambient not to play on repeat. Fades out any current sounds that are playing before playing the new sound.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound to be played on repeat.

      • addSound

        public void addSound(Sound sound)
        Adds a sound to the list of available ambient sounds for this node to play.
        Parameters:
        sound - The new sound to be added to the list.

      • removeSound

        public void removeSound(Sound sound)
        Removes a sound from the available list of sounds for this node.
        Parameters:
        sound - The sound to remove.

      • setVolume

        public void setVolume(float targetVolume)
        Sets the volume of this node.
        Parameters:
        targetVolume - The desired volume.
